title: The WPS function is out of the way  enabling the WLAN service of HG?
answer:
(1) Check the wireless network card supports the function of WPS or not.
(2) Check whether you have enabled the function of hiding WLAN SSID or not. Disable this function in the webpage for WLAN service, otherwise we couldn’t use the function of WPS correctly.
(3)We need to active WPS negotiation process between HG and the network card when we hope to enable the function of WPS, and the time for activation can’t go beyond two minutes.
(4) Make sure that there has no configuration files used before in the wireless configuration tool of Windows. Old configuration files may result in a failure of importing configuration information to the wireless configuration tool of Windows, though the WPS negotiation has succeeded.
